channel.title: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]
channel.description: FIXED :) Mods can lock this now.

item.title: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

[quote=“suomirunee, post:10, topic:238023”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=314243.msg2500145#msg2500145 date=1224620028]
Change it to the skill id of which you want it to add the expirence to, just change the 30 into a 3.
[/quote]Thanks Rich! I would rep you if max rep wasn’t 200.
The way how I got the error was, that I got SYIed and then it gave me a virus, wich messed a little bit of my server before I remorved it.[/quote]
thank god you remorved it!

Read full topic
item.source: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]

The way how I got the error was, that I got SYIed and then it gave me a virus, wich messed a little bit of my server before I remorved it.

item.title: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Change it to the skill id of which you want it to add the expirence to, just change the 30 into a 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:7, topic:238023”]Kind of obvious.
It’s this:

addSkillXP(hitDiff, 30);[/quote]Thanks, but what do I do to it?
Sorry, if I sound like a noob.

Read full topic
item.source: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]

Kind of obvious.
It’s this:

addSkillXP(hitDiff, 30);

item.source: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]

item.title: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:5, topic:238023”]i dont know what source you have but make a copy of your client.java before you try this out

try replacing your attackmethod with one of rich’s

[code]public boolean Attack() {
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP[playerHitpoints];
int casterX = absX;
int casterY = absY;
int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;
int EnemyX2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
attackingPlayerId = AttackingOn2.playerId;
int hitDiff = 0;

	resetAnimation();

	poisondmg = false;
	newhptype = false;
	hptype = 0;

	CalculateMaxHit();
	hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
	TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);

	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1291 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7630 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6528 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == -1 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6562 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7409) {
		PkingDelay = 6;
	}	
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4710 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2815 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2821 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1359 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {
		PkingDelay = 7;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2745 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2746 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2747 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2748 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1319 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) {
		PkingDelay = 8;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1373 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6914) {
		PkingDelay = 10;
	}

	boolean UseBow = false;
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7603) {
		PkingDelay = 10;
		if(DDStimer == 0 && actionTimer == 0) {
			dbvoid();
			actionTimer = 1;
			DDS2Damg = true;
			DDStimer = 1;
			UseBow = true;
		}
	}
	if (hasCrystalBow()) {
		PkingDelay = 8;
		UseBow = true;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) {
		PkingDelay = 5;
		UseBow = true;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2761) {
		rcvoid();
		PkingDelay = 16;
		addSkillXP(hitDiff * 20, 4);
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6724) {
		PkingDelay = 10;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 85 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) {
		PkingDelay = 5;
		UseBow = true;
	}
	if (UseBow) {
		inCombat();
		CheckArrows();
		CalculateRange();
	}

	if (nonWild() || AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
		ResetAttack();
		sendMsg("That player can't be attacked because they aren't in the Wilderness!");
	} else if (!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
		if (smite) {
			AttackingOn2.playerLevel[5] -= hitDiff/4;
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.protMelee) {
			hitDiff = hitDiff/2;
		}
		if (absX == AttackingOn2.absX && absY == AttackingOn2.absY) {
			WalkTimer(-1, 0);
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.playerRights == 2 && !AttackingOn2.isInFightPits() && !isInFightPits()) {
			ResetAttack();
			sendMsg("RichScape Moderators can't attack other players.");
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 2774 && AttackingOn2.playerId != 0 && misc.random(14) == 1) {
			AttackingOn2.hitDiff = misc.random(12);
			AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
			AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true;
			AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			gfxRich(451);
			AttackingOn2.sendMsg("The dragonfire shield's dragon breath burns you!");
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.canVengeance && hitDiff != 0 && !UseBow) {
			hitDiff = (int)(hitDiff / 1.2);
			currentHealth -= (int)(hitDiff / 1.2);
			hitUpdateRequired = true;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			AttackingOn2.canVengeance = false;
			AttackingOn2.txt4 = "Taste vengeance!";
			AttackingOn2.string4UpdateRequired = true;
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.attackingPlayerId != playerId && AttackingOn2.attackingPlayerId != 0 && (absX >= 2900 && absX <= 3100 && absY >= 3500 && absY <= 3700)) {
			sendMsg("Someone else is already fighting your opponent.");
			ResetAttack();
		}
		if (!CheckWildrange(AttackingOn2.combat) && !nonWild() && !isInFightPits()) {
			WildernessMessage();
		}
	if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || hasCrystalBow() || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2761 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7603 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6914 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) {
		if (LoopAttDelay <= 1) {
			if (!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
				if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == true) {} else if (!UseBow) {
					setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
					server.FollowHandler.follow(AttackingOn, playerId);
					AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
					AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true;
					AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
						AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
						hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
						AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
						AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true;
						AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
						TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
					}
					AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
					AttackingOn2.inCombat();
					setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
					AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
					LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay;
					if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
						hitDiff = EnemyHP;
					}
					addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
					client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
					PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
					if (usingSpecial) {
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							animation(343, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							startAnimation(1058);
							gfxRich(248);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2745 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(482);
							calculateSpecial();
							BGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2747 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							gfxRich(285);
							calculateSpecial();
							SGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							NewHP += hitDiff;
							if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]))
								NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2746 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							gfxRich(263);
							calculateSpecial();
							AGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7630 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							stillgfx(656, EnemyY, EnemyX);
							calculateSpecial();
							SSSpec();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2748 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(369);
							stillgfx(372, EnemyY, EnemyX);
							AttackingOn2.barrage();
							calculateSpecial();
							ZGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(283);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount >= 75) {
							gfxRich(349);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && specialAmount >= 25) {
							gfxRich(251);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158 && specialAmount >= 40) {
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25) {
							calculateSpecial();
							DDSSpecial();
							AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(342);
							calculateSpecial();
							maulSpec();
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							calculateSpecial();
							hally();
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						usingSpecial = false;
						specialDamage = 0;
						specialDamage2 = 0;
						specialAttacks();
						specialAttacks2();
						specialAttacks3();
						specialAttacks4();
						specialAttacks5();
						specialAttacks6();
					}
				} else if (UseBow) {
					if (!HasArrows) { 
						ResetAttack();
						sendMsg("You don't have any arrows to use with your bow!");
					} else if (HasArrows) {   
						if (!hasCrystalBow()) {
							DeleteArrow();
						}
						if (AttackingOn2.protRange) {
							hitDiff = hitDiff/2;
						}
						if (!hasCrystalBow() && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) {
							ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false);
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
							setAnimation(426);
							drawback();
							ProjectileRang(offsetX, offsetY, AttackingOn, 0);
						}
						if (usingSpecial) {
							if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 60) {
								bowSpecc();
								RangeDelay = 0;
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 78, 249, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 70, 249, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								calculateSpecial();
								hitDiff = misc.random(getRangeHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + getArrowHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerArrows]));
								usingSpecial = false;
								specialDamage = 0;
								specialDamage2 = 0;
							}
							if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7603 && specialAmount >= 70) {
								darkbow();
								RangeDelay = 0;
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 78, 643, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 70, 643, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								calculateSpecial();
								hitDiff = misc.random(getRangeHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + getArrowHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + 5);
								usingSpecial = false;
								specialDamage = 0;
								specialDamage2 = 0;
							}
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
							specialAttacks();
							specialAttacks2();
							specialAttacks3();
							specialAttacks4();
							specialAttacks5();
							specialAttacks6();
						}
						TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
						AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
						AttackingOn2.inCombat();
						inCombat(); 
						LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay;
						if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
							hitDiff = EnemyHP;
						}
						teleportToX = absX;  
						teleportToY = absY;
						addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
						PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
					}
				}

			}
			return true;
		} else {
			sendMsg("That player can't be attacked because they aren't in the Wilderness!");
			ResetAttack();
			}
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code][/quote] That won't work with my server, Im sure.

(For the ppl that want to help)
I posted my attack method, you can look in it and tell what’s wrong If you can.

Read full topic
item.source: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]

item.title: Pking doesn't work in my server anymore! [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

i dont know what source you have but make a copy of your client.java before you try this out

try replacing your attackmethod with one of rich’s

[code]public boolean Attack() {
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP[playerHitpoints];
int casterX = absX;
int casterY = absY;
int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;
int EnemyX2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY2 = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
attackingPlayerId = AttackingOn2.playerId;
int hitDiff = 0;

	resetAnimation();

	poisondmg = false;
	newhptype = false;
	hptype = 0;

	CalculateMaxHit();
	hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
	TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);

	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1291 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7630 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6528 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1333 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == -1 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6562 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7409) {
		PkingDelay = 6;
	}	
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4710 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2815 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2821 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1359 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1275) {
		PkingDelay = 7;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2745 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2746 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2747 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2748 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1319 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1265 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) {
		PkingDelay = 8;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1373 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6914) {
		PkingDelay = 10;
	}

	boolean UseBow = false;
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7603) {
		PkingDelay = 10;
		if(DDStimer == 0 && actionTimer == 0) {
			dbvoid();
			actionTimer = 1;
			DDS2Damg = true;
			DDStimer = 1;
			UseBow = true;
		}
	}
	if (hasCrystalBow()) {
		PkingDelay = 8;
		UseBow = true;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734) {
		PkingDelay = 5;
		UseBow = true;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2761) {
		rcvoid();
		PkingDelay = 16;
		addSkillXP(hitDiff * 20, 4);
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6724) {
		PkingDelay = 10;
	}
	if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 85 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) {
		PkingDelay = 5;
		UseBow = true;
	}
	if (UseBow) {
		inCombat();
		CheckArrows();
		CalculateRange();
	}

	if (nonWild() || AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
		ResetAttack();
		sendMsg("That player can't be attacked because they aren't in the Wilderness!");
	} else if (!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
		if (smite) {
			AttackingOn2.playerLevel[5] -= hitDiff/4;
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.protMelee) {
			hitDiff = hitDiff/2;
		}
		if (absX == AttackingOn2.absX && absY == AttackingOn2.absY) {
			WalkTimer(-1, 0);
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.playerRights == 2 && !AttackingOn2.isInFightPits() && !isInFightPits()) {
			ResetAttack();
			sendMsg("RichScape Moderators can't attack other players.");
		}
		if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 2774 && AttackingOn2.playerId != 0 && misc.random(14) == 1) {
			AttackingOn2.hitDiff = misc.random(12);
			AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
			AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true;
			AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			gfxRich(451);
			AttackingOn2.sendMsg("The dragonfire shield's dragon breath burns you!");
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.canVengeance && hitDiff != 0 && !UseBow) {
			hitDiff = (int)(hitDiff / 1.2);
			currentHealth -= (int)(hitDiff / 1.2);
			hitUpdateRequired = true;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			AttackingOn2.canVengeance = false;
			AttackingOn2.txt4 = "Taste vengeance!";
			AttackingOn2.string4UpdateRequired = true;
		}
		if (AttackingOn2.attackingPlayerId != playerId && AttackingOn2.attackingPlayerId != 0 && (absX >= 2900 && absX <= 3100 && absY >= 3500 && absY <= 3700)) {
			sendMsg("Someone else is already fighting your opponent.");
			ResetAttack();
		}
		if (!CheckWildrange(AttackingOn2.combat) && !nonWild() && !isInFightPits()) {
			WildernessMessage();
		}
	if (GoodDistance(EnemyX, EnemyY, absX, absY, 1) == true || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 859 || hasCrystalBow() || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 843 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4734 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2761 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7603 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6914 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861) {
		if (LoopAttDelay <= 1) {
			if (!nonWild() && !AttackingOn2.nonWild()) {
				if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == true) {} else if (!UseBow) {
					setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
					server.FollowHandler.follow(AttackingOn, playerId);
					AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
					AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true;
					AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
						AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
						hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
						AttackingOn2.hitUpdateRequired = true;
						AttackingOn2.updateRequired = true;
						AttackingOn2.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
						TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
					}
					AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
					AttackingOn2.inCombat();
					setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
					AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
					LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay;
					if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
						hitDiff = EnemyHP;
					}
					addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
					client player = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId];
					PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
					if (usingSpecial) {
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							animation(343, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							startAnimation(1058);
							gfxRich(248);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2745 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(482);
							calculateSpecial();
							BGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2747 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							gfxRich(285);
							calculateSpecial();
							SGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							NewHP += hitDiff;
							if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]))
								NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2746 && specialAmount >= 50) {
							gfxRich(263);
							calculateSpecial();
							AGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7630 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							stillgfx(656, EnemyY, EnemyX);
							calculateSpecial();
							SSSpec();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2748 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(369);
							stillgfx(372, EnemyY, EnemyX);
							AttackingOn2.barrage();
							calculateSpecial();
							ZGSSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(283);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount >= 75) {
							gfxRich(349);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && specialAmount >= 25) {
							gfxRich(251);
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7158 && specialAmount >= 40) {
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount >= 25) {
							calculateSpecial();
							DDSSpecial();
							AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							gfxRich(342);
							calculateSpecial();
							maulSpec();
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6739 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							calculateSpecial();
							hitDiff = specialDamage;
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204 && specialAmount >= 100) {
							calculateSpecial();
							hally();
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
						}
						usingSpecial = false;
						specialDamage = 0;
						specialDamage2 = 0;
						specialAttacks();
						specialAttacks2();
						specialAttacks3();
						specialAttacks4();
						specialAttacks5();
						specialAttacks6();
					}
				} else if (UseBow) {
					if (!HasArrows) { 
						ResetAttack();
						sendMsg("You don't have any arrows to use with your bow!");
					} else if (HasArrows) {   
						if (!hasCrystalBow()) {
							DeleteArrow();
						}
						if (AttackingOn2.protRange) {
							hitDiff = hitDiff/2;
						}
						if (!hasCrystalBow() && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0) {
							ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false);
						}
						if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4734) {
							setAnimation(426);
							drawback();
							ProjectileRang(offsetX, offsetY, AttackingOn, 0);
						}
						if (usingSpecial) {
							if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount >= 60) {
								bowSpecc();
								RangeDelay = 0;
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 78, 249, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 70, 249, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								calculateSpecial();
								hitDiff = misc.random(getRangeHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + getArrowHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerArrows]));
								usingSpecial = false;
								specialDamage = 0;
								specialDamage2 = 0;
							}
							if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7603 && specialAmount >= 70) {
								darkbow();
								RangeDelay = 0;
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 78, 643, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 70, 643, 43, 31, attacknpc+1);
								calculateSpecial();
								hitDiff = misc.random(getRangeHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]) + getArrowHitDiff(playerEquipment[playerArrows]) + 5);
								usingSpecial = false;
								specialDamage = 0;
								specialDamage2 = 0;
							}
							usingSpecial = false;
							specialDamage = 0;
							specialDamage2 = 0;
							specialAttacks();
							specialAttacks2();
							specialAttacks3();
							specialAttacks4();
							specialAttacks5();
							specialAttacks6();
						}
						TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
						AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
						AttackingOn2.inCombat();
						inCombat(); 
						LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay;
						if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
							hitDiff = EnemyHP;
						}
						teleportToX = absX;  
						teleportToY = absY;
						addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
						PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
					}
				}

			}
			return true;
		} else {
			sendMsg("That player can't be attacked because they aren't in the Wilderness!");
			ResetAttack();
			}
		}
	}
	return false;
}[/code]
